layer.name: Causality
layer.definition: Actions have consequences; you reap what you sow.

questions.text: I understand that small compromises in integrity compound into larger character issues over time.
questions.principle: Small causes compound into large effects

questions.text: I can see that most 'sudden' moral failures are actually the result of many small prior choices.
I recognize that honesty and deception both have natural consequences — trust or suspicion, clarity or confusion.
questions.principle: Truth and lies produce predictable outcomes

questions.text: I understand that when I ignore my conscience repeatedly, it becomes harder to hear — this is cause and effect, not random.
questions.principle: Conscience sensitivity responds to how you treat it

questions.text: I can connect the quality of my relationships to how I've treated people — the harvest matches the seed.
